pages.text: 106|2|sita arau graismakalara bhramanata sihamtara asakti ache.
106|3|Eteke sihamte yena e'i gharara pratipalakara ibadata karae.
106|4|Yijane sihamtaka ksudha arasthata khadya pradana karaiche arau santraasara paraa niraapatta diche.
107|1|Tumi taka dekhichane yiye hicapa pratidanaka asbikara karae
107|2|si se'ijane'i, yiye anathaka kathorabharae khedi pathiyaya
107|3|arau si dukhiyaka khana khuraabalai utsaha nidiye.
108|2|Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara uddesye chalata adaya karaa arau korabani karaa.
